introduction: SYNOPSISDong-sik is a lecturer who grew up an orphan. He laments the fact that he can no longer support himself. He becomes a male prostitute. When he first sees Su-ok, Dong-sik realizes that they are from the same fabric. He proposes to her. Her mother serviced foreign military men when Su-ok was young. She managed to graduate college. When her boyfriend Duk-gi learns of Su-ok's family history, he dumps her. Dong-sik injures himself so Su-ok moves into his apartment. As the two eagerly work towards living normal lives, Duk-gi comes looking for Su-ok and insults her. Unable to bear his insult, Su-ok kills Duk-gi. Subsequently, Su-ok and Duk-gi swim out to the blue ocean, searching for their utopia.故事偶然梦见噩梦的监狱在游泳池里偶然遇到仪式。果阿的土人东植失去了作为讲师的生命，却不能再坚持下去。他在南昌的世界中滚动身体，忽略了他第一次看到的监狱。Joko度过了她的岳母岳母的童年并上了大学，但是她的爱人知道日本的生活环境并把她抛弃了。当残破的尸体成为示威的目标时，我在学习时会见并享受仪式。仪式受到伤害，监狱住在他的公寓里。当他们愿意过上正常的人生时，美德就会入狱侮辱他们。监狱不能忍受和杀死美德。那样，玉和跳舞跑到蓝色的大海。他们在海中游泳，寻找他们的天堂。
